subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|敬|馬|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}}, as horses are [[skittish]] (easily startled).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=jīng
|c=geng1,ging1
|c_note=geng1 - vernacular; ging1 - literary
|md=giăng/gĭng
|md_note=giăng - vernacular; gĭng - literary
|mn=kiaⁿ/kh:keⁿ/tp,xm:kiⁿ/keng
|mn_note=kiaⁿ - vernacular; keⁿ/kiⁿ - vernacular (limited use, e.g. {{zh-l|*驚蟄}}); keng - literary
|h=pfs=kiâng
|mn-t=gian1
|w=1jin
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=v,a,adv
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fear]]; to be [[afraid]]
# {{lb|zh|of a horse etc.}} to be [[startle]]d; to [[shy]]
# to [[frighten]]; to [[scare]]
# [[scary]]; [[frightening]]
# [[fearfully]]; I'm [[afraid]] that ...
